title: Sports-Based Character Leadership Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Sports Activity Knowledge and Educational Field Experience
context.additional_context: Character education competency enhancement program for current elementary school teachers, aiming to foster social responsibility through sports activities

learning_goals: Learners must be able to design responsibility education programs for students using the TPSR (Teaching Personal and Social Responsibility) model
Learners must accurately execute collaborative problem-solving strategies in SEM (Social-Emotional Learning) model-based team sports activities with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners must be able to assess character development levels using a sportsmanship rubric, distinguishing at least three stages

resources: TPSR (Teaching Personal and Social Responsibility) Step-by-Step Worksheet
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
